target: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_SEQ_00<tab>ドタール・カー付近のゴウセツは、憤慨しているようだ。
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_TODO_02<tab>ドタール・カーで情報を集める

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_DOTHARL02511_000_000<tab>Thank you again, but I shall manage on my own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_DOTHARL02511_000_000こっちはもう大丈夫だ。
気にしないで、行ってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_010<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I cannot in good conscience ignore the callous disregard that woman showed for her kinsman!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>殿ッ！
やはり拙者、サドゥとやらの根性が許せぬ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_011<tab>We must seek her out at once! With me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_011偵察のついでに、ひとこと物申してやろう。
いざ、「ドタール・カー」に乗り込もうではござらんか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_020<tab>Such contempt as was in their eyes I have never known... But for the soul to live on as they say is not something I can so easily accept.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_020……皆、すっかり元通りでござるな。
刹那の間ではあったが、まるで蛇に睨まれた蛙の気分よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_021<tab>Do they truly believe this? All of them? That in death there can be rebirth? ...Retribution?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_021しかし、生まれ変わりとは……
拙者には理解が及ばぬが、ドタール族にとっては、
まぎれもない真実ということか……？

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_022<tab>...In any event, we came here in search of information. We cannot leave without speaking with her people.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_022謎は深まるばかりでござる……。
されど収穫なしに戻るわけにもいかぬ。
ひとまず、ここの者に話を聞いてみるといたそう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>Err...that is to say, then, that death is essentially meaningless?
target: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>むぅ……つまり、どういうことでござる？

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_040<tab>I know you! Reunion! The travelers with the Mol girl!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_040あーっ！？
おたく、ちょっと前に再会の市にいただろ！
なんか見た顔だなって思ったんだよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_041<tab>I marked you after I left the Oronir. Ones from Doma, others I could not place.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_041あの日は、オロニル族の野郎にケンカふっかけられてよぉ。
最低な気分でぶらついてたら、おたくらを見かけたんだ。
で、なんか変な奴らがいるなーって。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_042<tab>My name is Koko. Welcome to Dotharl Khaa.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_042また会うなんて思ってなかったが、縁は結べ、再会は祝せだな。
オレは「ココ」ってんだ、よろしく！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_043<tab>Hm? Koko sounds to your ear the name of a woman? Well, of course. That would be because it is.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_043アン？　名前が可愛いだと……？
そりゃ、最初のココは女だったんだから、仕方ねぇだろ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_044<tab>I died a woman and was reborn a man. It is of no moment─the soul is the soul, and the flesh the flesh.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_044今のココ……オレは男だけどよ、
身体の性別なんて、魂の根源にはちっとも関係ねぇ。
どっちに生まれ変わろうが、この魂が宿るかぎり「ココ」だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_045<tab>Perhaps you scoff? Many would. Many look only to the name and the flesh, and let these things dictate their perceptions.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_045……ま、余所者には、ちっとややこしいか。
名前と身体の性別が合ってても、言動が一致しない例もあるし。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_046<tab>Consider Sadu Khatun. Three times before she died a man, yet she returns as a woman the fourth. Yet she is no less fierce, and any outsider foolish enough to think so will learn the truth to their peril.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_046サドゥ様を見てみろよ。
前の三代が男で、当代でもまわりが同じに扱ったもんだから、
すっかり男前に育ってるだろ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_047<tab>Is the khatun woman or man? A stupid question. She is Sadu.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_KOKO_000_047サドゥ様の男前っぷりときたら……
オレが女だったら、イチコロで惚れてるな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_050<tab>The cycle of death and rebirth? It is simply that. Take me─I died in battle with the Hotgo. Fiercely did I fight, and so I returned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_050生まれ変わりについて聞きたい？
そうですね……前代のわたしは、ホトゴ族との戦いで、
獅子奮迅の活躍をして死んだと聞いています。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_051<tab>Alas, we know naught of our past lives. I must learn what it means to be Qoyar again and again. It is difficult to remember everything, but important.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_051もちろん、今のわたしにその記憶はありません。
でも、まわりのみんなが教えてくれるので、
コヤルであるために大事なことはわかっています。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_052<tab>It filled me with such excitement when they first told me of my deeds, as did my friends!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_QOYAR_000_052前のわたしがどんな活躍をしたか、
最初に聞いたときは、とてもわくわくしました。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_060<tab>Impressive, is it not? 'Twas slain by my boy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_060ねえ見て！
うちの子が、獣を仕留めたんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_061<tab>We were childhood friends, he and I, before he fell and returned. A master of the bow. It is good to see that he retains his skill.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_061この子の前代は、あたしの幼馴染で、弓の名手だったんだ。
新しい姿になっても、さすがに筋がいいと思わないかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_062<tab>We competed against one another in the hunts. Though I knew he would return, I never expected it to be as my son!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_MERGEN_000_062狩りでよく競ってた幼馴染が、
亡くなって、あたしの子として再誕してくるなんてね。
わかったときは、なんだか嬉しくて温かくて、笑っちまったよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_070<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have completed your inquiries?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_070ああ、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
そちらも話を聞いてまわれたでござるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_071<tab>Aye, it is as she said. They believe with every fiber of their being that their bravest warriors will be reborn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_071ふむ、やはりドタール族は生まれ変わりを信じている。
真偽はともかく、それゆえに死を恐れず戦うのは、
もはや疑う余地もござらん。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_072<tab>As for me, I observed some of their warriors at practice. They are as formidable as the Oronir, perhaps more, and their weapons are their equal as well.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_072加えて、彼らの使う武器を見せてもらったが、
明けの玉座で見たものと比べても、
より洗練され、使い手の技量の高さがうかがい知れた。

source: TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_073<tab>Yet while they do not lack in skill and resources, 'tis plain to see that their numbers are inferior...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA413_02512_GOSETSU_000_073気がかりなことといえば……
それだけ心身が鍛練された戦士を有しておきながら、
集落が小さく、栄えていないことでござるが……。
